question: does lamictal cause extreme hunger for anyone else?
question_content:
i take 100 mg of Lamictal per day. ive gained 8 pounds so far because it makes me so hungry..i have times when i just binge on foods that arent even that good

does anyone else who is on lamictal experience this?

answers.answer_content: i take 100 mg of lamictal as well, and i dont think i've ever really experienced a change in hunger. i'd say that if you cant deal with it talk to your doctor. if you can deal with it though, and lamictal really seems to be working, let it be. also when i was presrcibed lamictal, the doctor said it had very very few side effects. i read over the side effects in the notes that come with it, and it doesnt say anything about appetite. but i'd say talk to your doctor!

I am 49 years old and have increased my lamictal dose to 225mg per day.  I feel hungry all the time and have increased water retention.  Mostly for sweet treats which I have terrible cravings that when I start eating I dont/cant stop until it is all gone.  However, even when I have eaten I still feel hungry.  I can t make my mind up whether this is because of my age (ie hormones) or the increase in lamictal.  Your views would be appreciated as this is making me feel very down.

Yes! When I was on Lamictal I was constantly hungry,especially at night. Talk to your doctor if it starts interfering with your life to much,there are other medications out there with the same positive benefits without the weight gain

Yes I have extreme hunger mostly in the morning after I take my meds. I started taking lamictal 50 mg BID earlier this year and have gained 12 lbs.! Never thought it could be the meds. :-(  They want me to increase to 100 mg BID and then I can decrease the keppra.
i found it was the only medication that didnt make me hungry all the time
